src_original: jetavane śutārtha piṇusyārāme mahatā bhikṣū sārdhama trayodaśābha-ū hitataiḥ bodhisatvena mahāsatvena śalāvalu bhagavānaṁ śrīyamaṁ kumāra bhagavāna layate smaṁ ||

āsmimaṁ śrīrūpa niṣṭhāyamaparimita guṇe saṁvasyāraiśa-ava nāmasoka dhṛtu sāslāma parimitā yuktāna suvinī ś vīgaste jo rājāya tathāgatāyā bhante samyakkaṁ buddhāya nabhābhidhiṣṭhīta tejo rājārāma dharmante śayati śruṇu maṁjuśrīḥ kumarabhūta i (30)  majamabuye manuṣyāsu spāyuṣo varṣaśatāyurska ṣāvaṁśunya kāsamasanāni nirdiṣṭhāni ||
te parikṣīṇā sarpunareva varṣa śatāyuṣo bhaviṣyānti |
yāvalu punaḥ maṁjuśrī satvāstatrā parimitāyujñāni su viniścita tejorājasya tathāgatasya nāmāṣṭo tasśetaṁ śroṣyānti dhāraciṣyānti vācayiṣyānti
tevāṁmāyu vividdhī dhiṣyāntice parikṣīṇā yuṣaḥ satvānāma dhyayaṁ śroṣyānti dhāraciṣyānti vāca dhiṣyānti teṣāṁma māyu rvivardhva ciṣyānti ||

yasmi pṛthvi pradeśva idaṁ ma parimitoyūḥ sūtraṁ likhiṣyaṁti ti likhā payiṣyaṁ ti sa pṛthivī pradaśercaya bhūto vaṁdanīya śva bhaviṣyaṁti tirdhagyo nigatānāṁ mṛga pakṣi dakṣiṇo kūjña pūre nipakti ṣyati gate sarva arurāyāṁ samyakkaṁ bodhisati saṁbholyante ||
oṁ namo bhagavate aparimitāyū jñāna sūviniścita tejo rājāyasa tathāgatā yā rhante samyakasambuddha-āya tadyathā ||
oṁ pūṇyaśgamahāpūṇya aparimitapūṇya aparimitāyū pūṇya jñāna saṁbhārā pacite oṁ sarvasaskāra pariśuddha dharmma te gagaṇa samudra te svabhāva viśuddha mahānaya parivāre svāhā || 20 ||
oṁ namo bhagavate aparimitoyū jñāna sūviniścita tejo raye sa tathāgatāya arhante samyakasambuddhāya ||
oṁ sarvasaskāra pariśuddha dharmete gagana samadra te svabhāva viśuddhe mahānaya parivāre svāhā || 21 ||
yaḥ idaṁ ma parimitāyūḥ ṅabhṛtraṁratra rājaṁ dharmma paryāya muddiṣyaya ekamāyi kāṣāya dāna dāspaṁtti ||
tena trisāham mahāsāham lokadhā-usakaratra mayaṁ pariṣūjña katvā dānaṁ dayostasya pūṇya skandhasya pramoṇagaśathi unatvaṁma parimitāyūḥ sūtrasyapūṇya skandhasya pramāṇaṁśa kvaṁgaṇayi-uṁ ||
